Through a series of levels you'll learn about common mistakes and gotchas when using Amazon Web Services (AWS). There are no SQL injection, XSS, buffer overflows, or many of the other vulnerabilities you mig...

Introduction
Building the right malware analysis environment is the first step for every malware researcher. When all system configurations and software installations are complete, you’re able to analyze and investigate malware properly.
